name: Ground Zero
summary: VR ZTD: Ground Zero is a thrilling VR tower defense game set in a zombie apocalypse. Players strategically use towers like the Photon Blaster, FlameThrower, and Freeze Ray to hold back zombie hordes. Gameplay is enhanced with intuitive controls and diverse maps like mountains, cities, and beach fronts. The game also features a competitive global leaderboard and wave progression system. The upcoming 1.1 update will introduce more towers, new maps, and player-controlled weapons.
